name: Burgerman's diner
description:
Welcome to Burgerman's diner!

IMPORTANT: you are located right above camera 1, in the top right room

You have been deemed fit for the nightshift duty, and will need to guard the restaurant for 3 days!

But your job isn't simple, the robot can move freely at night and you need to keep the server up and running.

Controls:

click on the door for flashlight

click on the bottom button for cameras

reset the server on cam "4"

press the "toggle door" button  you can find under the map in the cameras to close the door.

watch your power!

Known bugs:

-In the ending screen (pink slip) the menu button is broken, restart the game to go back.
